text: "Tell Me It's Real" is a 1999 song by K-Ci & JoJo and is the second single from their second studio album It's Real. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 13 in the Netherlands, number 4 in New Zealand and number 63 in Australia. It also went to number 16 in the United Kingdom in 2000 following its re-release. ==Track listing== ;UK 12" :A1. "Tell Me It's Real" (Album Version) – 4:42 :A2.
